name: Jeht
title: Drifting Sand, Drifting Dreams: Jeht
desc: "Here's a thousand hugs! We will meet again!"\n"May we meet again under a lovelier sun."

skills.desc: This card will record the number of cards discarded from your Support Zone during this match as Sophistication points. (Max 6 points)<span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">After your characters use an Elemental Burst: If this card has recorded at least 5 Sophistication points, discard this card and generate <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Omni Element equal to the number of <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Sophistication points minus 2.
